caption.p: Concentration-dependent effects of omeprazole on the acyclovir IC 50 in HSV-1- or HSV-2-infected HaCaT cells as determined by cytopathogenic effect (CPE) formation. Numerical values are presented in Supplementary Table S2. The investigated drug concentrations did not affect cell viability, neither alone or in combination. âˆ— P < 0.05 relative to nucleoside analogue alone.
